channel.title: There is (was) a fire going on by my house! (new part added)
channel.description:
thers a fire in the area were i live! people down the street are supposevly evacuating but thats from my 15 year old sister with a processing problems..... my mom is at an important meeting with her new business, great...
this part is new))]
i took the bus home and we saw like fire trucks and fire copters and planes dropping water and that red stuff,
